Vicen»õiu works at the [MariaDB Foundation](https://mariadb.org/) as a Software Engineer. He focuses on Optimizer development, but has also worked on other parts of the MariaDB Server. Notable projects include: Window Functions in MariaDB, Custom Aggregate Functions in MariaDB, Roles in MariaDB
